## DragPayload interface

Base payload for drag events. Contains the element being dragged, the corresponding mouse event, the current position, and the position when drag started.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DragPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [e](./browser-ui.dragpayload.e.md) | Event |  |
|  [el](./browser-ui.dragpayload.el.md) | Element |  |
|  [originalPosition](./browser-ui.dragpayload.originalposition.md) | PointXY |  |
|  [payload?](./browser-ui.dragpayload.payload.md) | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [pos](./browser-ui.dragpayload.pos.md) | PointXY |  |
